mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.order_no, o.buyer_id, o.seller_id, it.name AS item_name, it.icon_url, o.total_amount, o.status, o.create_time, o.pay_time, o.deliver_time, o.finish_time FROM trade_order o LEFT JOIN user_inventory ui ON o.inventory_id = ui.id LEFT JOIN base_item_template it ON ui.template_id = it.id WHERE o.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trade_order (order_no, buyer_id, seller_id, listing_id, inventory_id, total_amount, status, create_time) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{buyerId}, #{sellerId}, #{listingId}, #{inventoryId}, #{totalAmount}, #{status}, #{createTime})
